title: Result of applying circulation rules to determine a request policy
description: Describes the outcome of applying circulation rules to determine a request policy

requestPolicyId.description: ID of the request policy determined by the circulation rules

appliedRuleConditions.description: Addition information about conditions which were present in the applied rule

materialTypeMatch.description: Indicates that ItemType was present in applied rule conditions

loanTypeMatch.description: Indicates that LoanType was present in applied rule conditions

patronGroupMatch.description: Indicates that PatronGroup was present in applied rule conditions
